table.name: posts
table.column: Perfect. Just perfect. I appreciate that the series ended at the right time, and I can feel that it served its exact purpose. The whole cast/crew deserves a standing ovation. Every detail of this series is so meaningful, funny, sad, smart, emotional.

table.name: posts
table.column: The Good Place is a fantastic show that I will forever remember fondly and to anyone reading this I hope you give the show a chance and watch it through.

table.name: posts
table.column: I love this show. It's a feel good comedy that's lighthearted and will make you laugh while still trying to get some good life lessons across.

table.name: posts
table.column: After watching the last two final episodes of this series I've changed my rating from 8 to 10. Why? Because I loved the last two episodes - the simple and sweet ending they gave to this awesome show, with no twists whatsoever. Gonna miss this show.

table.name: posts
table.column: I thought this would be boring, but watched the pilot... then the second episode... then the third... fourth... fifth... sixth... seventh... and came full-stop only because those are the only episodes I could watch now On Demand.

table.name: posts
table.column: The good place is when a tv show is changing the world for the better.

table.name: posts
table.column: Honestly, this show is fun. That's the bottom line for it. I have watched the first eight episodes so far, and it's not the funniest or most clever TV I have every watched, but it was fun to view.

table.name: posts
table.column: One of the most inquisitive and exquisite shows ever made. So deep on so many levels but yet fascinatingly simple. Goodness, beauty, happiness, truth. Simply transcending.

table.name: posts
table.column: There are very few tv shows/movies that I give 10 stars - and The Good Place is one of them.

table.name: posts
table.column: I almost didn't watch The Good Place, but I was pleasantly surprised. It is well done and very entertaining. The writers have done a nice job of designing a biting satire on thinking about the afterlife without attacking any real religion in particular.

table.name: posts
table.column: I've been watching the Good Place since it was first release and now that it's over I can say that it never disappointed.

table.name: posts
table.column: I wasn't too sure about this series at the start but after getting halfway through I was hooked! The actors all play their role perfectly and the humor is very well constructed. I will be sad to see it end.
